respStmt.name: Apex Data Services
Electronic Text Center, University of Virginia
Apex Data Services

availability.p: © 2002 by the Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia.

notesStmt.note: Page images have been included from the print version.
Images were shot with a PhaseOne PowerPhase FX digital camera, on a TTI Reprographic workstation, with a Rodenstock 130mm or 180mm lens on a 4x5 studio camera.

editorialDecl.p: The images exist as archived TIFF images, with one or more JPEG versions for general use.
